q_ch: 列出所有缝纫组的进度百分比。
q_en: List the progress percentage of all sewing groups
gt:
Sure thing! Let's take a look at the progress percentages for all the sewing groups. Here's a handy table for you:

| Sewing Group      | Progress Percentage |
|-------------------|---------------------|
| Master Sewers     | 97.4441%            |
| Skilled Sewers    | 97.2222%            |
| Advanced Sewers   | 81.9588%            |
| Premier Sewers    | 74.6667%            |
| Elite Sewers      | 44.0678%            |

Keep up the great work, sewing teams! 🎉🧵

steps.sql: SELECT working_group_id, SUM(completed_number) AS total_completed, SUM(planned_number) AS total_planned FROM sewing_tasks GROUP BY working_group_id;
steps.description: Retrieve the total completed quantity and planned quantity for each sewing task

steps.sql: SELECT wg.name, (st.total_completed / st.total_planned) * 100 AS progress_percentage FROM (SELECT working_group_id, SUM(completed_number) AS total_completed, SUM(planned_number) AS total_planned FROM sewing_tasks GROUP BY working_group_id) st JOIN working_group wg ON st.working_group_id = wg.id WHERE wg.type = 'sew';
steps.description: Calculate the progress percentage for each sewing group

response:
Sure thing! Let's take a look at the progress percentages for all the sewing groups. Here's a handy table for you:

| Sewing Group       | Progress Percentage |
|--------------------|---------------------|
| Master Sewers      | 97.44%              |
| Skilled Sewers     | 97.22%              |
| Advanced Sewers    | 81.96%              |
| Premier Sewers     | 74.67%              |
| Elite Sewers       | 44.07%              |

Looks like the Master Sewers are leading the way! Keep up the great work, everyone! 🎉🧵
